From the manufacturer

Neutrogena Sesame Body Oil

Experience Neutrogena Body Oil. Its lightweight formula glides on easily to moisturize and nourish your skin without leaving a greasy feel. In just a few seconds, skin is left soft and silky, ready to slip into the sheerest of fabrics. It's so sheer that it instantly vanishes into shower-damp skin, sealing in moisture.

This unique body moisturizer uses a light oil extracted from pure white sesame seeds which helps skin maintain its moisture balance, while providing a subtle, soothing fragrance. Skin feels hydrated and soft, with a radiant healthy looking glow.

IN THE BATH

Use during a relaxing shower, or add to bathwater to soften as you soak.

MOISTURIZE EXTRA DRY SKIN

For healthier looking skin, apply oil directly to knees, cuticles, and elbows. Massage into skin for 20 seconds or until oil has fully absorbed.

LIGHTWEIGHT FORMULA ABSORBS QUICKLY

Just apply a quarter-sized amount directly to skin and rub for 30 seconds or until the oil has absorbed into the skin.

Product Description

Neutrogena Fragrance-Free Body Oil with Light Sesame Oil formula glides on easily for a moisturizing experience to get nourished skin that feels smooth and silky. Lightweight body oil for dry skin pampers your skin as a sheer moisturizer that instantly absorbs, providing essential hydration while locking in moisture without leaving a greasy feel. The light sesame oil formula is extracted from pure white sesame seeds, an ingredient that helps skin maintain its moisture balance while providing a subtle, soothing fragrance and leaving skin with a radiant, healthy-looking glow. This skin moisturizing Neutrogena body oil provides instant hydration in seconds, and the dry skin moisturizer provides sheer nourishment for skin to help maintain essential moisture without the heavy feeling of a lotion. To use after a shower or bath, smooth on a few drops and massage oil onto body while still damp. Add body oil to bath water and use as a bath oil to help soften and nourish your skin.

Important information

Safety Information

When using Neutrogena Body Oil or any bath product, take special care to avoid slipping.

Ingredients

Isopropyl myristate, sesamum indicum (sesame) seed oil, PEG-40 sorbitan peroleate, propylparaben, BHT.

Directions

AFTER SHOWER OR BATH: While skin is still damp, smooth on a few drops to help seal in moisture. Let your body dry naturally, or simply pat dry with a towel. IN THE BATH: Add to water and soften your skin while you bathe.

How customer reviews and ratings work

Customer Reviews, including Product Star Ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them.

To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness.
